lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Mark Manson, an analyst at Donaldson Lufkin Jenrette, said options available to Ceasars also include a restructuring in the form of a selloff of individual properties, a stock buyback or forming a master limited partnership.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Caesars World Inc is likely to seek out a friendly suitor or restructure operations to fight off the unsolicited takeover offer by investor Martin Sosnoff, securities analysts said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A Caesars spokesman said the company expects to file a 14D-9 with the Securities and Exchange Commission later today with more information on its analysis of the Sosnoff offer.

lst.name: sentence
